perturbation.original_text: 6.10 Interest on Late Payments. If any payment due to either Party under this Agreement is not paid when due, then such paying Party shall pay interest thereon (before and after any judgment) at [***] such interest to run from the date on which payment of such sum became due until payment thereof in full together with such interest; provided however that [***], then such interest [***], as adjusted from time to time on the [***].
perturbation.changed_text: 6.10 Interest on Late Payments. If any payment due to either Party under this Agreement is not paid when due, then such paying Party shall pay interest thereon (before and after any judgment) at [***] such interest to run from the date on which payment of such sum became due until payment thereof in full together with such interest; provided however that no interest will be charged on any late payments.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction by stating that interest will be charged on late payments and then immediately stating that no interest will be charged. This creates ambiguity regarding the consequences of late payments.

perturbation.original_text: 11.6 Insurance. Each Party shall obtain and carry in full force and effect the minimum insurance requirements set forth herein. Such insurance (a) shall be primary insurance with respect to each Party's own participation under this Agreement, (b) shall be issued by a recognized insurer rated by A.M. Best "A-VII" (or its equivalent) or better, or an insurer pre- approved in writing by the other Party, and (c) shall list the other Party as an additional insured under the General Liability Policy.
perturbation.changed_text: 11.6 Insurance. Each Party shall obtain and carry in full force and effect the minimum insurance requirements set forth herein. Such insurance (a) shall be primary insurance with respect to each Party's own participation under this Agreement, (b) shall be issued by a recognized insurer rated by A.M. Best "A-VII" (or its equivalent) or better, or an insurer pre- approved in writing by the other Party, and (c) shall not list the other Party as an additional insured under the General Liability Policy.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction by stating that a Party should list the other Party as an additional insured, and then immediately stating that a party should not list the other party as an additional insured. This creates ambiguity regarding the extent of protection either party has.

perturbation.original_text: 12.3 Additional Termination Rights by AbbVie. AbbVie may terminate this Agreement in its entirety, or on a country or other jurisdiction -by-country or other jurisdiction basis, for any or no reason, upon ninety (90) days' prior written notice to Harpoon.
perturbation.changed_text: 12.3 Additional Termination Rights by AbbVie. AbbVie may terminate this Agreement in its entirety, or on a country or other jurisdiction -by-country or other jurisdiction basis, only for specific reasons outlined in section 12.2, upon ninety (90) days' prior written notice to Harpoon.
perturbation.explanation: This change creates an in-text contradiction by stating that AbbVie may terminate the agreement for any or no reason, and then immediately stating that AbbVie can only terminate for specific reasons. This creates ambiguity regarding AbbVie's termination rights.
